DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the impact of the 10-week Active and Healthy Families (AHF) intervention on body mass index (BMI) in Latino youth aged 5-12 years.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Active and Healthy Families
DOC.criteria: Aged 512 years Body mass index greater than or equal to the 85th percentile for age and sex Patients seen at Contra Costa County clinics participating in Active and Healthy Families Spanish speaking Parent of participant Previous participation in Active and Healthy Families
